LanguageData.Cloning_Cooldown_Description: By default, extracting a clone embryo causes gene sickness just like extracting or implanting genes normally would. Use these options to either disable that functionality (And make clones as fast as you can afford them), or adjust the duration of the sickness.
LanguageData.Cloning_Settings_CooldownDays_Tooltip: Measured in days. 1 Year is 60 days. Default
